he shall <S%G3361><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> honor <S%G5091><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother. <S%G3384><s%>' You <S%G2532><s%> have made <S%G208><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> void <S%G208><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> your tradition. <S%G3862><s%>
You hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> did <S%G4395><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

That which enters <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man; <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that which proceeds out <S%G1607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth, <S%G4750><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>"

Leave them <S%G846><s%> alone. <S%G863><s%> They are <S%G1526><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> guides <S%G3595><s%> of the blind. <S%G5185><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> guide <S%G3594><s%> the blind, <S%G5185><s%> both <S%G297><s%> will fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a pit. <S%G999><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G402><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the region of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon. <S%G4605><s%>

so that <S%G5620><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> wondered <S%G2296><s%> when they saw <S%G991><s%> the mute <S%G2974><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> injured whole, <S%G5199><s%> lame <S%G5560><s%> walking, <S%G4043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%>- and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1392><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
